DOC.brief_summary: Other study suggest low Vitamin D level may contribute musculoskeletal pain . Hypothesis : Administration oral Vitamin D supplement improve vague musculoskeletal pain child .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin D Versus Placebo Treatment Vague Musculoskeletal Pain Children
DOC.criteria: age 514 healthy vague musculoskeletal pain without diagnosis medication ( steroid , seizure medication , birth control pill shoot ) endocrinopathies
